attributes.action: Legislate to bring about fair pay for fathers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current legislative framework for paid paternity leave acts as a barrier to fathers taking paternity leave.

We the undersigned call upon the Government to amend the existing regulations to provide fathers with the right to one month of paid paternity leave; consisting of two weeks annual leave and two weeks statutory paternity pay at £112.50 or 90% of income which ever is the higher amount.
